text:
I need to upload images in HubDB using CSV file.
*Things I have tried:*
1: I have tried giving name of image and upload the file but it didn't worked.
2: Copy the image URL and upload it using file it worked.

Can anyone have a solution?
If you give the full image url in the csv file, it works..

I'm using hubdb for a staff listing page — what is the best way to force a table row to be the first in the listing (president of the company) while they others follow a queryparam of orderBy last name, etc.
